channel.title: [delta] Need 2 commands plz [delta]
channel.description:
can some1 give me the code for the ::suggest command & the changename command?
my base is delta

item.title: [delta] Need 2 commands plz [delta]
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

lol u really want to be spoonfed… why dont u read up some tutorials, and for suggest its just a simple write log code, i mean here

if(command.startsWith("suggest")) { sendMessage("Sending..."); sendMessage("Suggestion Succesfully Sent To masternoob! :D"); BufferedWriter bw = null; String suggestion = command.substring(8); try { bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("suggestions.txt", true)); bw.write(playerName+": "+suggestion); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch (IOException ioe) { ioe.printStackTrace(); } finally { if (bw != null) try { bw.close(); } catch (IOException ioe2) { sendMessage("Error Suggesting"); } } }

also make a suggestions.txt file in the main source

Read full topic

item.title: [delta] Need 2 commands plz [delta]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

if you don’t know a thing about JAVA this isn’t going to help you but if you do then well you might be able to grasp this… anyways, 2 commands with the rest of your commands,1st to do ::suggest something like this, if command.starts with whatever you want the command to be, write everything they say into a txt file. 2nd change name command could maybe be done similar to the already done ::change password command that is in most delta bases.

Read full topic
